mapper.select: SELECT SEAT_NO, MEMBER_NO, SEAT_STATUS, SEAT_DATE, SEAT_CODE FROM SEAT ORDER BY SEAT_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT S.SEAT_NO, S.MEMBER_NO, S.SEAT_STATUS, S.SEAT_DATE, S.SEAT_CODE FROM SEAT S INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId})A
SELECT S.SEAT_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM SEAT S INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SEAT SET MEMBER_NO = NULL, SEAT_STATUS = 1, SEAT_DATE = NULL, SEAT_CODE = NULL WHERE TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), SEAT_DATE)) > TIME_TO_SEC('02:00:00')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEAT_INFO (MEMBER_NO, SEAT_NO, SEAT_DATE) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{seatNo}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
